documentationURL.description: A URL to the human readable documentation of this object

linkageGroupCount.description: The number of linkage groups present in a `GenomeMap`

mapDbId.description: The ID which uniquely identifies a `GenomeMap`

mapName.description: A human readable name for a `GenomeMap`

mapPUI.description: The DOI or other permanent identifier for a `GenomeMap`

markerCount.description: The number of markers present in a `GenomeMap`

scientificName.description: Full scientific binomial format name. This includes Genus, Species, and Sub-species

type.description: The type of map this represents, usually "Genetic" or "Physical"

unit.description: The units used to describe the data in a `GenomeMap`
